definitions.definition: To eject something violently (such as lava or water, as from a volcano or geyser).
examples: The volcano erupted , spewing lava across a wide area.

definitions.definition: To burst forth ; to break out .
examples: The third molar tooth erupts late in most people, and sometimes does not appear at all.

definitions.definition: To spontaneously release pressure or tension .
To suddenly appear in a certain region in large numbers.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To eject something violently (such as lava or water, as from a volcano or geyser).
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To burst forth ; to break out .
( intransitive , figuratively ) To spontaneously release pressure or tension .
( intransitive , biology ) (Of birds, insects, etc.) To suddenly appear in a certain region in large numbers.
